item.title: ‘I will carry Inter forever in my heart’ – PSG’s Hakimi says farewell to I Nerazzurri
item.description: Following his move to the Parisians, the Morocco international said his goodbyes to the reigning Serie A champions via social media
item.dc:creator: Shina Oludare

item.title: Euro 2020: ‘He looked solid & convincing’ – Yobo credits Donnarumma for Italy’s win over Spain
item.description: The Paris Saint-Germain goalkeeper made several vital saves as the Azzurri qualified for the tournament’s final at the expense of La Roja

item.title: 'Toughest game I ever played' - Bonucci hails Italy heart after Azzurri 'suffer' through win over Spain
item.description: The defender helped his country move into the Euro 2020 final against either England or Denmark

item.title: Italy star Chiesa dedicates Man of the Match award to injured Spinazzola after triumph over Spain
item.description: The goalscorer led the tributes to the defender, who suffered a ruptures Achilles against Belgium

item.title: Aina and African players who could replace Hakimi at Inter Milan

item.title: Did Moses deserve one final Chelsea hurrah under Tuchel?
item.description: The ex-Nigeria wideman’s move to Spartak Moscow was finalised at the weekend, but could he have offered solutions to the Blues?

item.title: 'Not even Iniesta!' - Pedri earns comparisons to Spain legend after impeccable Euro 2020 display
item.description: The 18-year-old midfielder was one of La Roja's best players in the Euro 2020 semi-final against Italy

item.title: Simon & Super Eagles who benefitted from mushroom club moves
item.description: Following the NFF’s vow to stop NPFL stars from playing in obscure leagues in Europe, Goal looks at Nigeria players who have gained from such a move
item.dc:creator: Shina Oludare

item.title: Morata overtakes Torres and joins Ronaldo to make history with dramatic late equaliser against Italy
item.description: The Spain striker's fantastic goal kept his team's hopes alive in their Euro 2020 semi-final at Wembley

item.title: Eriksen and medical staff who saved him invited to Euro 2020 final

item.title: Euro 2020 matchday LIVE: Italy vs Spain updates, news and TV reaction
